description: Demolition of the existing two storey side infill extension at the lower-ground and upper-ground level; erection of a single storey extension to the rear and side at the lower-ground floor level; erection of a two storey extension to the rear and side at the upper-ground and first floor level; alterations existing side addition to includes alteration to the roof and installation of a rooflight and new front entrance doors; replacement of the existing timber framed single glazed windows to the front elevation at the lower-ground, first and second floor levels with timber framed single glazed windows and replacement of the existing timber framed single glazed windows to the rear elevation at the first and second floor levels to the rear elevation with double glazed timber framed windows; installation of a timber framed double glazed window to the rear elevation at the second floor level; replacement of the existing handrail to the front entrance with wrought iron stair handrail; replacement of the existing railings and gate to the front garden with cast iron railings; redecorate and repair the facades; re-landscaping the front and rear garden including relevelling; internal alterations including works to lower ground floor, upper ground floor, first and second floor level including lowering of the existing finished floor levels of the lower ground floor and altering the layout of internal walls; associated internal and external alterations.
borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
